lead_paragraph: A report in the Sports Briefing on Tuesday about Everton’s 1-1 tie at Liverpool in Premier League soccer carried incorrect information from The Associated Press about Liverpool’s last league championship, in 1990. It was the Football League First Division title — not a championship of the Premier League, which was created in 1992.
